alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches; Red River; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 30 at 11:57AM CDT until March 30 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northeastern Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Winn Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1156 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Campti, or 10 miles northwest of Natchitoches, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Campti around 1200 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Clear Lake, Creston, Powhatan, Calvin, Goldonna and Black Lake. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
